text: "Why Don't You Love Me" is a 1950 song by American country singer Hank Williams. It is the B-side to the single "A House Without Love". It went to number 1 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles chart. It was covered by American country singer Connie Smith for her 1975 album I Got a Lot of Hurtin' Done Today / I've Got My Baby on My Mind and went to number 15 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles chart. == References == Category:1950 songs Category:Hank Williams songs
title: Why Don't You Love Me (Hank Williams song)
